name: Knife Your Friends
description:
Made for a week long game jam where the theme was 'death must be happening'

The game is a local coop two player game about racing to find the golden knife and killing the other player before the round ends. fast paced gameplay alongside a low poly art style. 

Made by myself and  itch.io/profile/adamjdyoung

the 3d assets were purchased from the unreal marketplace. 

* A controller is required for player 2 *
